title: Properties of matter. Ep. 1. Solids, liquids and gases
brief_description: Sir Lawrence Bragg illustrates the different forms which water can take; shows how these changes in form depend upon changes in temperature; compares the three divisions of matter, and discusses latent heat and pressure. Suitable for secondary level.
